video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK VIVOCam AW-GEV Series Switch Setup
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/FvYs8t
➤ Learn more:http://www.vivotek.com/vivocam-poe-managed-switch
The VIVOTEK AW-GEV series, referred to as VivoCam PoE switch, is the world's first PoE switch with IP surveillance management functions. This switch is not only a standard L2 PoE switch, but also able to set up and configure VIVOTEK IP cameras, NVR and CMS. With single AW-GEV series, the VivoCam PoE switch allows users to find all VIVOTEK devices and deploy a surveillance network system automatically.

VIVOTEK SUPREME IP8151 Fixed nearby road at Night (without IR light)
video:video.video:description:
Video Resolution: 1280*720
WebPage: http://www.vivotek.com/products/model.php?network_camera=ip8151
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/2FZRNR
The IP8151 camera supports the industry-standard H.264 compression technology, drastically reducing file sizes and conserving valuable network bandwidth. With MPEG-4 and MJPEG compatibility also included, video streams can also be transmitted in any of these formats for versatile applications. The streams can also be individually configured to meet different needs or bandwidth constraints, thereby further reducing loading and enabling users to receive multiple streams simultaneously in different resolutions, frame rates, and image qualities for viewing on different platforms.
Features
* 1.3 Megapixel CMOS Sensor * Supreme Night Visibility * Up to 30 fps @ 1280x1024 * 3.1 ~ 8 mm Vari-focal, Auto-iris Lens * Removable IR-cut Filter for Day & Night Function * Real-time H.264, MPEG-4 and MJPEG Compression (Triple Codec) * Multiple Simultaneous Streams * ePTZ for Data Efficiency * Activity Adaptive Streaming for Dynamic Frame Rate Control * Tamper Detection for Unauthorized Changes * Built-in SD/SDHC Card Slot for On-board Storage * Built-in 802.3af Compliant PoE * CS- or C-mount Adjustment Ring for Flexible Lens Installation * Supports ONVIF Standard to Simplify Integration and Enhance Interoperability

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK SUPREME IP8151 Inside a car at Night (without IR light)
video:video.video:description:
Video Resolution: 1280*720
WebPage: http://www.vivotek.com/products/model.php?network_camera=ip8151
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/wuAx1c
VIVOTEK IP8151 is a professional-series fixed network camera, featuring 1.3-megapixel resolution with superb megapixel image quality and exceptional bandwidth efficiency. Equipped with SONY's latest sensor technology "ExMor", the IP8151 captures both exceptional details during daytime and offers unparalleled visibility under low-light conditions.
Features
* 1.3 Megapixel CMOS Sensor * Supreme Night Visibility * Up to 30 fps @ 1280x1024 * 3.1 ~ 8 mm Vari-focal, Auto-iris Lens * Removable IR-cut Filter for Day & Night Function * Real-time H.264, MPEG-4 and MJPEG Compression (Triple Codec) * Multiple Simultaneous Streams * ePTZ for Data Efficiency * Activity Adaptive Streaming for Dynamic Frame Rate Control * Tamper Detection for Unauthorized Changes * Built-in SD/SDHC Card Slot for On-board Storage * Built-in 802.3af Compliant PoE * CS- or C-mount Adjustment Ring for Flexible Lens Installation * Supports ONVIF Standard to Simplify Integration and Enhance Interoperability

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK VS8801/8401 Professional Rack Mount Design
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ozNly2
VIVOTEK VS8801, the new milestone in video server security performing 8-CH high resolution with high frame rate in H.264, are able to convert analog video into digital video with the highest quality. The H.264 compression format drastically reduces the file sizes and conserves valuable bandwidth and storage space. The VS8801 supports single stream to be transmitted in H.264, MPEG-4 and MJPEG formats for versatile applications. The stream can also be individually configured with frame rates, resolution, and image quality so as to meet different platforms or bandwidth constraints.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK WDR Technology Provides the Optimum Solution
video:video.video:description:
WDR cameras are thus recommended for outdoor locations, as well as indoor locations where light enters from multiple angles, such as a room with large or numerous windows. WDR technology ensures that even if the subject happens to stand in front of an intense light source, the camera will be able to capture the detail necessary for identification purposes or other desired uses.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/G7nDHi

VIVOTEK ND8322P is a Linux embedded 8-CH standalone NVR with 8-port 802.3at/af Compliant PoE, allowing connection with PoE cameras for a max. 80 W power supply. ND8322P also features "One Button Setup" with its plug- &-play and auto-setup functionality, making this advanced unit surprisingly simple to install, and suitable for any small-scale video surveillance applications.

video:video.video:title: Uploading VCA package and license
video:video.video:description:
Line Crossing Detection Field Detection Object Counting On-Camera Video Content Analysis (VCA)
VIVOTEK's Video Content Analysis (VCA) is an embedded application package for VIVOTEK cameras, and includes three key functions—Line Crossing Detection, Field Detection, and Object Counting. The VCA application package follows the debut of the VIVOTEK Application Development Platform (VADP), an open platform for integrating video analysis functionality within its cameras, and can analyze data directly on a camera to provide solutions for business applications, in addition to traditional security use.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/NM4k5c
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/vca/

video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK IP8362 is a best-in-class 1080p outdoor bullet network camera designed for diverse outdoor applications. With full HD resolution in 16:9 aspect ratio and WDR enhancement, users can identify image details in extremely bright as well as dark environments.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Embedded Plug & Play NVR ND8322P
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ThX64K
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8322p/
ND8322P Supporting HDMI and VGA local video output, users can control the GUI OSD interface via mouse & keyboard, eliminating the need for a separate PC to search video or to playback from the NVR. The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. What's more, ND8322P, featuring various I/O ports, such as eSATA port, alarm input/output, RS232, and RS485 provides users great flexibility of applications.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK IP816A-LPC Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/4U00aT
➤ Learn more about IP816A-LPC: http://vivotek.com/ip816a-lpc/
VIVOTEK IP816A-LPC represents a total solution for LPC (License Plate Capture) applications by leveraging the top-notch quality and traffic monitoring ability of the IP816A-HP. With the adoption of built-in corresponded IR LEDs and an IR pass filter, the IP816A-LPC delivers clear license plate images for reliable recognition, in both the highest levels of glare, and in the darkest hours of the night.

video:video.video:description:
➤ Learn more about V-Pro H.265: http://www.vivotek.com/h265
A pioneer in the use of H.265 technology for surveillance applications, VIVOTEK is proud to launch the new V-Pro H.265 network camera series, available in 3MP and 5 MP and a range of form factors. Utilizing VIVOTEK's sophisticated Smart Stream II, the cameras are able to optimize resolution of an area and ensure maximum efficiency of bandwidth. Combining H.265 and Smart Stream II, the new series reduces bandwidth and storage consumption up to 80% more than cameras using H.264.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8370-HV Installation
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/1t66ct
➤ Learn more about CC8370-HV: http://vivotek.com/cc8370-hv/
Hardware Installation Steps:
1. Jot down the camera's MAC address for later reference. This is important if you have multiple cameras at different installation sites.
2. Attach the alignment sticker to a preferred location. Drill a cabling hole and the pilot holes for the mounting screws. You can then hammer in the plastic anchors.
3. Open the top cover by loosening the anti-tamper screws.
4. Install a MicroSD card (if local storage is preferred). Replace the desiccant bag to ensure the camera is not damaged by moisture.
5. When connecting the LAN cable, use the cable housing to make sure the connections are waterproof.
5-1. Pass an Ethernet cable (without the RJ45 connector) through the seal dome, rubber seal, and the cable gland body.
5-2. When done, use a crimping clamp to connect the wires to an RJ45 connector.
5-3. Route the cable through the cabling hole. Connect the Ethernet connector. Install the waterproof housing with a seal ring. Tighten up the connector.
6. Secure the camera to wall using the included screws.
7. Install the top cover by fastening the anti-tamper screws.
8. Install the "Installation Wizard 2" software utility that can be found on VIVOTEK's website.
9. The program will search for VIVOTEK Video Receivers, Video Servers or Network Cameras on the same LAN.
10. Double-click on the camera's MAC address to open a browser management session with the camera.
11. With a live view is displayed on your laptop, check the live view to ensure the image is in focus.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8370-HV Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/dRG68X
➤ Learn more about CC8370-HV: http://vivotek.com/cc8370-hv/
VIVOTEK's CC8370-HV is a vandal-proof fisheye network camera offering up to 30 fps at 3-Megapixel resolution. With its unique anti-grip design and inconspicuous appearance, the CC8370-HV plays a life secure guard role in unique security environments. Without ligature edges, it will effectively eliminate self-harm and suicide happen, ideal for detention house, holding cells, psychiatric ward, mental hospital, and correctional institution. Featuring 180° horizontal panoramic views with adjustable 25° tilt angle, the camera allows users amazing flexibility of viewing angles and options. The camera's weather-proof compact size also makes it an ideal choice for indoor and outdoor scenario such as boutique, convenience store, bank, school, parking lot and street.

➤ Learn more about IP816A-LPC: http://vivotek.com/ip816a-lpc/
VIVOTEK IP816A-LPC represents a total solution for LPC (License Plate Capture) applications by leveraging the top-notch quality and traffic monitoring ability of the IP816A-HP. With the adoption of built-in corresponded IR LEDs and an IR pass filter, the IP816A-LPC delivers clear license plate images for reliable recognition, in both the highest levels of glare, and in the darkest hours of the night.

video:video.video:title: ND8422P Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/pZXfMt
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8422p/
VIVOTEK ND8422P is a Linux embedded 16-CH standalone NVR with 8-port 802.3af Compliant PoE, allowing connection with PoE cameras for a max. 120 W power supply. ND8422P also features "One Button Setup" with its plug- &-play and auto-setup functionality, making this advanced unit surprisingly simple to install, and suitable for any small-scale video surveillance applications.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) Webinar
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/FH0I4v
➤ Learn more about CC8130(HS): http://www.vivotek.com/cc8130-hs/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/4iXfdk
➤ Learn more about CC8130(HS): http://vivotek.com/cc8130-hs/
The VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) is a height-strip network camera equipped with a 180 degree wide-angle lens, delivering clear images for reliable facial recognition. An ideal installation height of 170cm (5.5 ft) allows the CC8130(HS) to capture clear facial images at eye view, even when the subject is wearing a hat or hood. In addition, the plug and play design makes the CC8130(HS) installation simple and rapid. Combining low-profile and high- level features, the CC8130(HS) is ideal for discreet indoor applications, such as retail, banks, restaurants, small businesses and particularly in cashier areas. To dramatically reduce file sizes and conserve valuable network bandwidth, the CC8130(HS) supports the industry-standard H.264 compression technology. Combined with the ST7501 multi-lingual 32-channel recording software, users can quickly and easily set up an IP surveillance system that's simple to operate but hard to beat.

The VIVOTEK AW-GEV series, referred to as VivoCam PoE switch, is the world's first PoE switch with IP surveillance management functions. This switch is not only a standard L2 PoE switch, but also able to set up and configure VIVOTEK IP cameras, NVR and CMS. With single AW-GEV series, the VivoCam PoE switch allows users to find all VIVOTEK devices and deploy a surveillance network system automatically.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK EZConnect App
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/1aeByl
➤ Learn more about EZConnect App: http://www.vivotek.com/ezconnect/
➤ Features: The EZConnect works with a server hosted by VIVOTEK for bridging and tunneling video requests between client devices and network cameras/CMS/NVR. The utility simplifies and facilitates network configuration for access across the Internet.
With this utility, you do not need to configure IP port forwarding on router or set up a DDNS address for the NVR. You do not even need to know the IP address of the NVR. The EZConnect utility automatically manages the network parameters required for making the connection. The EZConnect comes with viewing and playback interfaces very similar to those in the iViewer utility.

video:video.video:description:

VIVOTEK is pleased to announce the launch of the high-performance, but low-profile, FE8180. This tiny camera is not only extremely low-profile, with a diameter of only 90mm, but also able to be mounted directly on the wall to capture 180° panoramic views, or on the ceiling for a 360° surround view, with zero blind-spots. A single FE8180 can easily do the job of three to four standard CCTV cameras, dramatically reducing the cost of ownership, while blending in with any interior or exterior.

The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. video:video.video:title: Uploading VCA package and license
video:video.video:description:
Line Crossing Detection Field Detection Object Counting On-Camera Video Content Analysis (VCA)
VIVOTEK's Video Content Analysis (VCA) is an embedded application package for VIVOTEK cameras, and includes three key functions—Line Crossing Detection, Field Detection, and Object Counting. The VCA application package follows the debut of the VIVOTEK Application Development Platform (VADP), an open platform for integrating video analysis functionality within its cameras, and can analyze data directly on a camera to provide solutions for business applications, in addition to traditional security use.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/pQ324i
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Tiny Design Video Server VS8100
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK VS8100 is a small-sized H.264 1-CH video server that helps you migrate from analog to digital surveillance system with ease. Its power sharing with CCTV and tiny design make it ideal for front-end installation and surveillance applications such as home, offices, retail stores, banks, and city surveillance, where their power supply and IP network connections are already settled. VS8100 supports a variety types of analog cameras, including PTZ cameras with its Pan/Tilt/Zoom control through the built-in RS-485 port.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/Hbq3De
➤ Learn more about VS8100: http://goo.gl/Y4zq6S

video:video.video:title: NR8401 Setting Procedure
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8401 is a 16-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1/5/10 is supported with four HDDs, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. Like VIVOTEK NVR ND8301, a local display output port is available with full HD resolution (1920x1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP address, HDD to logical volumes, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8401 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8401 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate the configuration to multiple cameras.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/HGuDRn
➤ Learn more about NR8401: http://goo.gl/quf3RO

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK 3-Megapixel WDR Mini-Box Network Camera IP8173H
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK's IP8173H network camera features a 3-Megapixel WDR CMOS sensor to cope with challenging lighting conditions. The WDR feature allows the camera to capture both the dark and bright parts of an image and combine the differences to generate a highly realistic image representative of the original scene, enabling it to provide video quality close to the capabilities of the human eyes. The IP8173H can be widely applied in high contrast environments such as lobby entrances and more. The P-iris lens controls the iris with extreme precision; with its built-in stepper motor, it maintains the iris opening at an optimal level at all times, resulting in superior image clarity and depth of field as well as image quality.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/QhJPxK

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Network Video Recorder NR8201/8301
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK's NR8201/8301 network video recorder offers an elegant recording solution for VIVOTEK network cameras and performs real-time monitoring and recording simultaneously. It supports up to 4-CH(NR8301)/8-CH(NR8301) H.264, MJPEG, and MPEG-4 video and provides multiple recording modes including alarm recording, scheduled recording, manual recording and continuous recording. The installation is very simple as the camera is able to be inserted utomatically when it's plugged in. It also offers a user-friendly interface for the user to configure the network settings and the camera control. Moreover, the 802.3af compliant PoE (Power-over-Ethernet) is able to reduce the complex of the installation, making NR8201/8301 the cost-effective recording systems. The user can utilize the NR8201/8301 to record high-definition mega-pixel videos on removable hard disk(s) with large capacity and a USB interface for data backup. The NR8201/8301 also supports an external hard disk from the eSATA interface. The built-in gateway separates the network camera connection and the data network connection for the prevention of network congestion. Functional four digital inputs and one digital output interfaces are capable of integrating with the security sensors and alarms. The NR8201/8301 are comprehensive network video recorders featuring with multiple functions to provide the best quality and highest performance in network video recording.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/Fh9pbl
➤ Learn more about NR8201: http://goo.gl/hrJ14s
➤ Learn more about NR8301: http://goo.gl/gHlvP4

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Panoramic PTZ
video:video.video:description:
360° Seamless Surveillance Solution Panoramic PTZ
Panoramic PTZ is a groundbreaking new technology developed by the VIVOTEK R&D team for monitoring open areas with extreme detail. This feature is realized through the synergy of a VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera with speed dome camera, and allows users to simultaneously monitor an area overview from a fisheye model while providing the capability for a detailed regional view from a speed dome. The VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera provides 360° surround view without blind spots, while the VIVOTEK speed dome provides fast, precise pan/tilt/zoom movement through its robust design and captures details with precise quality from extreme distances. Suitable applications for Panoramic PTZ include department stores, station lobbies, airports, parking lots, and any wide open areas where comprehensive video surveillance systems and the capability for extreme video detail are essential.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/rhgKU2
➤ Learn more about Panoramic PTZ: http://www.vivotek.com/pptz/

➤ Connection architecture ★ Supports VAST & ST7501 applications. ★ Supports hundreds of live view camera connections from an unlimited number of server connections. ★ Allows hundreds of server connections to be saved to a "Favorite" list for quick access.
➤ Control of real-time video display ★ Supports PTZ/ePTZ camera control through a PTZ panel and multi-touch interface. ★ Supports saving of preferred view settings through "Save layout". ★ Supports real-time switching of cameras by selecting one to replace the source of the current video displayed. ★ Allows capture of video frames using the "Snapshot" command.
➤ Remote playback ★ Supports single-channel playback initiated by search for a specific day/time. ★ Supports multiple choice of playback duration time from 1/2/5/10 min. ★ Supports variable-speed fast-forward and reverse. ★ Allows capture of video frames using "Snapshot"" command.
➤ Support for fisheye views ★ Supports configuration of fisheye views based on mount type and the video's native view type.

video:video.video:title: A Quick Look at ND8301 Installation
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8301 is an 8-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1 is supported with two removable HDDs for backup efficiency, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. A first desktop type for the VIVOTEK NVR series, a local display output port is now available with full HD resolution (1920X1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP, HDD, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8301 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8301 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate configuration settings to multiple cameras.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/M8IHCl
➤ Learn more about ND8301: http://goo.gl/rYD9R

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FD7141 Professional Fixed Dome Network Camera
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/G8Z1Nj
FD7141 is a professional vandal proof and weather proof outdoor fixed dome. It integrates all the elements needed for outdoor security into a compact package. FD7141 is shielded from dust and water with an IP66 rated housing and can fit in high-risk environments due to its vandal resistant design. And, in order to operate in harsh temperature conditions, we also build heater and fan inside FD7141.
Talking about video quality, FD7141 adopts a wide dynamic range CMOS sensor to take care of challenging lighting conditions. And it also provides true day and night functionality with a removable IR-cut filter and built-in IR illuminators. The vari-focal lens enables you to adjust focal length according to your needs.
Apart from a concrete housing and high video quality, FD7141 also provides several advanced features including dual streams, power over Ethernet, 3GPP, two-way audio by SIP protocol, SD card slot for local storage, and HTTPS encryption to ensure data transmission security.
To sum up, I think its one of the very best models that VIVOTEK has built. In terms of specification, quality and price, VIVOTEK FD7141 is definitely the camera of choice for any outdoor applications.

ND8322P Supporting HDMI and VGA local video output, users can control the GUI OSD interface via mouse & keyboard, eliminating the need for a separate PC to search video or to playback from the NVR. The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/1aeByl
➤ Learn more about EZConnect App: http://www.vivotek.com/ezconnect/
➤ Features: The EZConnect works with a server hosted by VIVOTEK for bridging and tunneling video requests between client devices and network cameras/CMS/NVR. The utility simplifies and facilitates network configuration for access across the Internet.
With this utility, you do not need to configure IP port forwarding on router or set up a DDNS address for the NVR. You do not even need to know the IP address of the NVR. The EZConnect utility automatically manages the network parameters required for making the connection. The EZConnect comes with viewing and playback interfaces very similar to those in the iViewer utility.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK WDR Technology Provides the Optimum Solution
video:video.video:description:
WDR cameras are thus recommended for outdoor locations, as well as indoor locations where light enters from multiple angles, such as a room with large or numerous windows. WDR technology ensures that even if the subject happens to stand in front of an intense light source, the camera will be able to capture the detail necessary for identification purposes or other desired uses.

video:video.video:title: The World's Smallest Network Fixed Dome Camera - VIVOTEK FD8136
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FD8136 is the world's smallest network fixed dome camera. With installation as easy as one-two-three and Power over Ethernet (PoE) functionality, setup time is completed in less than 120 seconds, making installation quick and easy. The FD8136 features a megapixel sensor enabling viewing resolution of 1280x800 at 30 fps, and also supports the industry-standard H.264 compression technology, drastically reducing file sizes and conserving valuable network bandwidth. With MPEG-4 and MJPEG compatibility also included, video streams can also be transmitted in any of these formats for versatile applications.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Embedded Plug & Play NVR ND8322P
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ThX64K
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8322p/
ND8322P Supporting HDMI and VGA local video output, users can control the GUI OSD interface via mouse & keyboard, eliminating the need for a separate PC to search video or to playback from the NVR. The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. What's more, ND8322P, featuring various I/O ports, such as eSATA port, alarm input/output, RS232, and RS485 provides users great flexibility of applications.

video:video.video:title: CC8130 - The Megapixel Panoramic Counter Camera
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK CC8130 is a compact cube camera especially designed for indoor surveillance. The unique design makes it the best choice for boutique, department or convenience stores. The ability to view at a wide angle at 180 degrees provides complete video security with no dead angles. The unique mounting design facilitates easy installation on a wall or desktop, capturing faces at eye level. A built-in microphone further increases the level of surveillance while recording sound within a 5 meter radius.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/uN8kma

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK SD8364E Footage - Defog
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK SD8364E is part of the SUPREME series product line offering 1080p Full HD resolution with superb image quality. Adopting a 30x optical zoom lens, the SD8364E is able to capture details at top-notch quality. The IP66- and NEMA 4X-rated housing protects the camera body against rain, dust and corrosion within a wide temperature range between -40°C to 55°C. This feature ensures operation under extreme weather conditions and hazardous environments. It is especially suitable for monitoring wide open indoor/outdoor spaces such as airports, highways and parking lots where high-level reliability and precision are always required.

VIVOTEK IP8151 is a professional-series fixed network camera, featuring 1.3-megapixel resolution with superb megapixel image quality and exceptional bandwidth efficiency. Features

➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/dRG68X

VIVOTEK's CC8370-HV is a vandal-proof fisheye network camera offering up to 30 fps at 3-Megapixel resolution. With its unique anti-grip design and inconspicuous appearance, the CC8370-HV plays a life secure guard role in unique security environments. Without ligature edges, it will effectively eliminate self-harm and suicide happen, ideal for detention house, holding cells, psychiatric ward, mental hospital, and correctional institution. Featuring 180° horizontal panoramic views with adjustable 25° tilt angle, the camera allows users amazing flexibility of viewing angles and options. The camera's weather-proof compact size also makes it an ideal choice for indoor and outdoor scenario such as boutique, convenience store, bank, school, parking lot and street.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8370-HV Installation
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/1t66ct
➤ Learn more about CC8370-HV: http://vivotek.com/cc8370-hv/
Hardware Installation Steps:
1. Jot down the camera's MAC address for later reference. This is important if you have multiple cameras at different installation sites.
2. Attach the alignment sticker to a preferred location. Drill a cabling hole and the pilot holes for the mounting screws. You can then hammer in the plastic anchors.
3. Open the top cover by loosening the anti-tamper screws.
4. Install a MicroSD card (if local storage is preferred). Replace the desiccant bag to ensure the camera is not damaged by moisture.
5. When connecting the LAN cable, use the cable housing to make sure the connections are waterproof.
5-1. Pass an Ethernet cable (without the RJ45 connector) through the seal dome, rubber seal, and the cable gland body.
5-2. When done, use a crimping clamp to connect the wires to an RJ45 connector.
5-3. Route the cable through the cabling hole. Connect the Ethernet connector. Install the waterproof housing with a seal ring. Tighten up the connector.
6. Secure the camera to wall using the included screws.
7. Install the top cover by fastening the anti-tamper screws.
8. Install the "Installation Wizard 2" software utility that can be found on VIVOTEK's website.
9. The program will search for VIVOTEK Video Receivers, Video Servers or Network Cameras on the same LAN.
10. Double-click on the camera's MAC address to open a browser management session with the camera.
11. With a live view is displayed on your laptop, check the live view to ensure the image is in focus.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8180 Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/7o85yw
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/fe8180/
VIVOTEK is pleased to announce the launch of the high-performance, but low-profile, FE8180. This tiny camera is not only extremely low-profile, with a diameter of only 90mm, but also able to be mounted directly on the wall to capture 180° panoramic views, or on the ceiling for a 360° surround view, with zero blind-spots. A single FE8180 can easily do the job of three to four standard CCTV cameras, dramatically reducing the cost of ownership, while blending in with any interior or exterior.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8180 Webinar - 0303
video:video.video:description: ➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/cEhu5A

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/4iXfdk
➤ Learn more about CC8130(HS): http://vivotek.com/cc8130-hs/
The VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) is a height-strip network camera equipped with a 180 degree wide-angle lens, delivering clear images for reliable facial recognition. An ideal installation height of 170cm (5.5 ft) allows the CC8130(HS) to capture clear facial images at eye view, even when the subject is wearing a hat or hood. In addition, the plug and play design makes the CC8130(HS) installation simple and rapid. Combining low-profile and high- level features, the CC8130(HS) is ideal for discreet indoor applications, such as retail, banks, restaurants, small businesses and particularly in cashier areas. To dramatically reduce file sizes and conserve valuable network bandwidth, the CC8130(HS) supports the industry-standard H.264 compression technology. Combined with the ST7501 multi-lingual 32-channel recording software, users can quickly and easily set up an IP surveillance system that's simple to operate but hard to beat.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: IP8372 30-meter IR illuminators (5MP, 2560x1920)
video:video.video:description:
IP8372 30-meter IR illuminators
VIVOTEK IP8372 is a professional bullet camera offering 5-Megapixel or 1080p Full HD resolution with superb image quality up to 30 fps. Featuring 5-Megapixel resolution and high-performance H.264/MPEG-4/MJPEG compression technology, the IP8372 offers extra-smooth video and wide coverage. For installers, properly adjusting the focus of a megapixel network camera can be difficult due to the level of image detail. The Smart Focus System allows for easy installation and adjustment by adopting a lens with a built-in stepper motor that can remotely control the focal length and precisely adjust the camera focus, offering hassle-free installation and maintenance.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/48TIU

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8171V - a Crystal Ball that Secures Your World
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FE8171V is the first fisheye fixed dome network camera from VIVOTEK, featuring detailed 3.1MP-resolution sensor with superb image quality. The FE8171V offers various display layouts, including original surround view, panoramic views, and regional views for various mounting applications. With the latest cutting-edge image processing, hemispherical images captured from the fisheye camera can be converted into conventional rectilinear projection for viewing and analysis. In addition, in the panoramic and regional viewing modes, users can utilize the ultra-smooth ePTZ function to easily zoom in and focus on a region of interest (ROI).
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/uc3Nkq
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Fisheye Network Camera FE8171V: http://goo.gl/1dlf3

WDR cameras are thus recommended for outdoor locations, as well as indoor locations where light enters from multiple angles, such as a room with large or numerous windows. WDR technology ensures that even if the subject happens to stand in front of an intense light source, the camera will be able to capture the detail necessary for identification purposes or other desired uses.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FD8355EHV Product Introduction
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FD8355EHV is a professional outdoor network dome camera offering 30 fps @ 1.3-Megapixel resolution with superb image quality. Featuring the new improved Wide Dynamic Range Technology WDR Pro II, it provides extreme visibility in extremely dark & light environments with 4 shutter capture methods. Combined 3D Noise Reduction Technology, which enables the FD8355EHV to capture clear, polished video under low-light conditions and reduce bandwidth from sensor noise, users can identify an increased level of image detail in extremely bright as well as dark environments.
More about FD8355EHV: http://www.vivotek.com/fd8355ehv/
Download Video: http://goo.gl/QJUpsV

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: Precautions to Avoid Damages to Cables
video:video.video:description:
When opening the rear cover: you should avoid damaging camera cables, Follow the procedure to properly open a rear cover:
1. Loosen the black cable gland. 2. Remove the rubber seal 3. and then you can open the rear cover.
The rear cover is removed!

video:video.video:title: Precautions for Maintaining IP66 Waterproofness
video:video.video:description:
Precautions for Maintaining IP66 Waterproofness:
If you should need to access the interior of the camera, e.g., to replace an SD card, follow the steps below:
1. Replace the moisture absorber. 2. Make sure the rear cover is securely tightened. 3. Rubber seal is adequately fit into place. 4. Completely tighten the waterproof cable gland.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8171V - a Crystal Ball that Secures Your World
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FE8171V is the first fisheye fixed dome network camera from VIVOTEK, featuring detailed 3.1MP-resolution sensor with superb image quality. The FE8171V offers various display layouts, including original surround view, panoramic views, and regional views for various mounting applications. With the latest cutting-edge image processing, hemispherical images captured from the fisheye camera can be converted into conventional rectilinear projection for viewing and analysis. In addition, in the panoramic and regional viewing modes, users can utilize the ultra-smooth ePTZ function to easily zoom in and focus on a region of interest (ROI).

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

Boasting WDR technology, the SD8362E can also cope with challenging lighting conditions and generate image quality close to the capabilities of a human eye. video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction

This feature ensures operation under extreme weather conditions and hazardous environments. video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: NR8401 Setting Procedure
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8401 is a 16-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1/5/10 is supported with four HDDs, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. Like VIVOTEK NVR ND8301, a local display output port is available with full HD resolution (1920x1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP address, HDD to logical volumes, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8401 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8401 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate the configuration to multiple cameras.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/HGuDRn
➤ Learn more about NR8401: http://goo.gl/quf3RO

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK 3-Megapixel WDR Mini-Box Network Camera IP8173H
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK's IP8173H network camera features a 3-Megapixel WDR CMOS sensor to cope with challenging lighting conditions. The WDR feature allows the camera to capture both the dark and bright parts of an image and combine the differences to generate a highly realistic image representative of the original scene, enabling it to provide video quality close to the capabilities of the human eyes. The IP8173H can be widely applied in high contrast environments such as lobby entrances and more. The P-iris lens controls the iris with extreme precision; with its built-in stepper motor, it maintains the iris opening at an optimal level at all times, resulting in superior image clarity and depth of field as well as image quality.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/QhJPxK
➤ Learn more about IP8173H: http://goo.gl/t2k4D8

video:video.video:title: Uploading VCA package and license
video:video.video:description:
Line Crossing Detection Field Detection Object Counting On-Camera Video Content Analysis (VCA)
VIVOTEK's Video Content Analysis (VCA) is an embedded application package for VIVOTEK cameras, and includes three key functions—Line Crossing Detection, Field Detection, and Object Counting. The VCA application package follows the debut of the VIVOTEK Application Development Platform (VADP), an open platform for integrating video analysis functionality within its cameras, and can analyze data directly on a camera to provide solutions for business applications, in addition to traditional security use.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/NM4k5c
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/vca/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK VC8201 Intro
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK VC8201 is a split-type camera system, which the camera unit and the video core are separated. With the separated design, it enables the camera unit to be much smaller, making installation easier as well as blending in decoration easily. In addition, the VC8201 can connect up to two 5-Megapixel camera units with 8-meter long cables, dramatically saving installation effort.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/pQ324i
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Panoramic PTZ
video:video.video:description:
360° Seamless Surveillance Solution Panoramic PTZ
Panoramic PTZ is a groundbreaking new technology developed by the VIVOTEK R&D team for monitoring open areas with extreme detail. This feature is realized through the synergy of a VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera with speed dome camera, and allows users to simultaneously monitor an area overview from a fisheye model while providing the capability for a detailed regional view from a speed dome. The VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera provides 360° surround view without blind spots, while the VIVOTEK speed dome provides fast, precise pan/tilt/zoom movement through its robust design and captures details with precise quality from extreme distances. Suitable applications for Panoramic PTZ include department stores, station lobbies, airports, parking lots, and any wide open areas where comprehensive video surveillance systems and the capability for extreme video detail are essential.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/rhgKU2
➤ Learn more about Panoramic PTZ: http://www.vivotek.com/pptz/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8171V - a Crystal Ball that Secures Your World
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FE8171V is the first fisheye fixed dome network camera from VIVOTEK, featuring detailed 3.1MP-resolution sensor with superb image quality. The FE8171V offers various display layouts, including original surround view, panoramic views, and regional views for various mounting applications. With the latest cutting-edge image processing, hemispherical images captured from the fisheye camera can be converted into conventional rectilinear projection for viewing and analysis. In addition, in the panoramic and regional viewing modes, users can utilize the ultra-smooth ePTZ function to easily zoom in and focus on a region of interest (ROI).
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/uc3Nkq
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Fisheye Network Camera FE8171V: http://goo.gl/1dlf3

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/pQ324i
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK 3-Megapixel WDR Mini-Box Network Camera IP8173H
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK's IP8173H network camera features a 3-Megapixel WDR CMOS sensor to cope with challenging lighting conditions. The WDR feature allows the camera to capture both the dark and bright parts of an image and combine the differences to generate a highly realistic image representative of the original scene, enabling it to provide video quality close to the capabilities of the human eyes. The IP8173H can be widely applied in high contrast environments such as lobby entrances and more. The P-iris lens controls the iris with extreme precision; with its built-in stepper motor, it maintains the iris opening at an optimal level at all times, resulting in superior image clarity and depth of field as well as image quality.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/QhJPxK
➤ Learn more about IP8173H: http://goo.gl/t2k4D8

video:video.video:title: V-Pro H.265 Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Learn more about V-Pro H.265: http://www.vivotek.com/h265
A pioneer in the use of H.265 technology for surveillance applications, VIVOTEK is proud to launch the new V-Pro H.265 network camera series, available in 3MP and 5 MP and a range of form factors. Utilizing VIVOTEK's sophisticated Smart Stream II, the cameras are able to optimize resolution of an area and ensure maximum efficiency of bandwidth. Combining H.265 and Smart Stream II, the new series reduces bandwidth and storage consumption up to 80% more than cameras using H.264.

video:video.video:description: ➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ZLl4s9

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8370-HV Installation
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/1t66ct
➤ Learn more about CC8370-HV: http://vivotek.com/cc8370-hv/
Hardware Installation Steps:
1. Jot down the camera's MAC address for later reference. This is important if you have multiple cameras at different installation sites.
2. Attach the alignment sticker to a preferred location. Drill a cabling hole and the pilot holes for the mounting screws. You can then hammer in the plastic anchors.
3. Open the top cover by loosening the anti-tamper screws.
4. Install a MicroSD card (if local storage is preferred). Replace the desiccant bag to ensure the camera is not damaged by moisture.
5. When connecting the LAN cable, use the cable housing to make sure the connections are waterproof.
5-1. Pass an Ethernet cable (without the RJ45 connector) through the seal dome, rubber seal, and the cable gland body.
5-2. When done, use a crimping clamp to connect the wires to an RJ45 connector.
5-3. Route the cable through the cabling hole. Connect the Ethernet connector. Install the waterproof housing with a seal ring. Tighten up the connector.
6. Secure the camera to wall using the included screws.
7. Install the top cover by fastening the anti-tamper screws.
8. Install the "Installation Wizard 2" software utility that can be found on VIVOTEK's website.
9. The program will search for VIVOTEK Video Receivers, Video Servers or Network Cameras on the same LAN.
10. Double-click on the camera's MAC address to open a browser management session with the camera.
11. With a live view is displayed on your laptop, check the live view to ensure the image is in focus.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8370-HV Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/dRG68X
➤ Learn more about CC8370-HV: http://vivotek.com/cc8370-hv/
VIVOTEK's CC8370-HV is a vandal-proof fisheye network camera offering up to 30 fps at 3-Megapixel resolution. With its unique anti-grip design and inconspicuous appearance, the CC8370-HV plays a life secure guard role in unique security environments. Without ligature edges, it will effectively eliminate self-harm and suicide happen, ideal for detention house, holding cells, psychiatric ward, mental hospital, and correctional institution. Featuring 180° horizontal panoramic views with adjustable 25° tilt angle, the camera allows users amazing flexibility of viewing angles and options. The camera's weather-proof compact size also makes it an ideal choice for indoor and outdoor scenario such as boutique, convenience store, bank, school, parking lot and street.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK ND8422P Webinar
video:video.video:description: ➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/isBbkZ

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FD816C-HF2 Installation
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/mikM3R
➤ Learn more about IP816A-LPC: http://vivotek.com/fd816c-hf2/
The VIVOTEK FD816C-HF2 is a recessed-mount fixed dome network camera offering up to 30 fps at 2-Megapixel resolution with superb image quality, even in the darkest hours of the night. Due to its compact size, the camera is able to blend into any surroundings such as banks, retail stores, restaurants, offices and more.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK IP816A-LPC Webinar
video:video.video:description: ➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/8QZJqQ

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK IP816A-LPC Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/4U00aT
➤ Learn more about IP816A-LPC: http://vivotek.com/ip816a-lpc/
VIVOTEK IP816A-LPC represents a total solution for LPC (License Plate Capture) applications by leveraging the top-notch quality and traffic monitoring ability of the IP816A-HP. With the adoption of built-in corresponded IR LEDs and an IR pass filter, the IP816A-LPC delivers clear license plate images for reliable recognition, in both the highest levels of glare, and in the darkest hours of the night.

video:video.video:title: ND8422P Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/pZXfMt
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8422p/
VIVOTEK ND8422P is a Linux embedded 16-CH standalone NVR with 8-port 802.3af Compliant PoE, allowing connection with PoE cameras for a max. 120 W power supply. ND8422P also features "One Button Setup" with its plug- &-play and auto-setup functionality, making this advanced unit surprisingly simple to install, and suitable for any small-scale video surveillance applications.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) Webinar
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/FH0I4v
➤ Learn more about CC8130(HS): http://www.vivotek.com/cc8130-hs/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/4iXfdk
➤ Learn more about CC8130(HS): http://vivotek.com/cc8130-hs/
The VIVOTEK CC8130(HS) is a height-strip network camera equipped with a 180 degree wide-angle lens, delivering clear images for reliable facial recognition. An ideal installation height of 170cm (5.5 ft) allows the CC8130(HS) to capture clear facial images at eye view, even when the subject is wearing a hat or hood. In addition, the plug and play design makes the CC8130(HS) installation simple and rapid. Combining low-profile and high- level features, the CC8130(HS) is ideal for discreet indoor applications, such as retail, banks, restaurants, small businesses and particularly in cashier areas. To dramatically reduce file sizes and conserve valuable network bandwidth, the CC8130(HS) supports the industry-standard H.264 compression technology. Combined with the ST7501 multi-lingual 32-channel recording software, users can quickly and easily set up an IP surveillance system that's simple to operate but hard to beat.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK AW-GEV Series VivoCam PoE Switch Webinar
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/53nzef ➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/vivocam-poe-managed-switch
The VIVOTEK AW-GEV series, referred to as VivoCam PoE switch, is the world's first PoE switch with IP surveillance management functions. This switch is not only a standard L2 PoE switch, but also able to set up and configure VIVOTEK IP cameras, NVR and CMS. With single AW-GEV series, the VivoCam PoE switch allows users to find all VIVOTEK devices and deploy a surveillance network system automatically.

➤ Features
• 2-Megapixel CMOS Sensor • 12 fps @ 2944x2944 • 1.5 mm Fisheye Lens for 180° Panoramic View and 360° Surround View • Removable IR-cut Filter for Day & Night Function • Real-time H.264 and MJPEG Compression • WDR Enhancement for Unparalleled Visibility in Extremely Bright and Dark Environments • Vandal-proof IK10-rated and Weather-proof IP66-rated Housing (FE8391-V) • 3D Noise Reduction for Low-light Conditions • ePTZ for Data Efficiency • 802.3at PoE Compliant • Built-in MicroSD/SDHC/SDXC Card Slot for On-board Storage • Pixel Calculator for Image Clarity Measurement • Support Local Dewarping • 360° 10 Meter IR (FE8391-V) • Panoramic PTZ Function with Speed Dome

video:video.video:description:

The VIVOTEK AW-GEV series, referred to as VivoCam PoE switch, is the world's first PoE switch with IP surveillance management functions. This switch is not only a standard L2 PoE switch, but also able to set up and configure VIVOTEK IP cameras, NVR and CMS. With single AW-GEV series, the VivoCam PoE switch allows users to find all VIVOTEK devices and deploy a surveillance network system automatically.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK EZConnect App
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/1aeByl
➤ Learn more about EZConnect App: http://www.vivotek.com/ezconnect/
➤ Features: The EZConnect works with a server hosted by VIVOTEK for bridging and tunneling video requests between client devices and network cameras/CMS/NVR. The utility simplifies and facilitates network configuration for access across the Internet.
With this utility, you do not need to configure IP port forwarding on router or set up a DDNS address for the NVR. You do not even need to know the IP address of the NVR. The EZConnect utility automatically manages the network parameters required for making the connection. The EZConnect comes with viewing and playback interfaces very similar to those in the iViewer utility.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8180 Intro
video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/7o85yw
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/fe8180/
VIVOTEK is pleased to announce the launch of the high-performance, but low-profile, FE8180. This tiny camera is not only extremely low-profile, with a diameter of only 90mm, but also able to be mounted directly on the wall to capture 180° panoramic views, or on the ceiling for a 360° surround view, with zero blind-spots. A single FE8180 can easily do the job of three to four standard CCTV cameras, dramatically reducing the cost of ownership, while blending in with any interior or exterior.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Embedded Plug & Play NVR ND8322P
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ThX64K
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8322p/
ND8322P Supporting HDMI and VGA local video output, users can control the GUI OSD interface via mouse & keyboard, eliminating the need for a separate PC to search video or to playback from the NVR. The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. What's more, ND8322P, featuring various I/O ports, such as eSATA port, alarm input/output, RS232, and RS485 provides users great flexibility of applications.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK VC8201 Installation
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK VC8201 is a split-type camera system, which the camera unit and the video core are separated. With the separated design, it enables the camera unit to be much smaller, making installation easier as well as blending in decoration easily. In addition, the VC8201 can connect up to two 5-Megapixel camera units with 8-meter long cables, dramatically saving installation effort.

video:video.video:title: Uploading VCA package and license
video:video.video:description:
Line Crossing Detection Field Detection Object Counting On-Camera Video Content Analysis (VCA)
VIVOTEK's Video Content Analysis (VCA) is an embedded application package for VIVOTEK cameras, and includes three key functions—Line Crossing Detection, Field Detection, and Object Counting. The VCA application package follows the debut of the VIVOTEK Application Development Platform (VADP), an open platform for integrating video analysis functionality within its cameras, and can analyze data directly on a camera to provide solutions for business applications, in addition to traditional security use.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/NM4k5c
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/vca/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/eNmdHG
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Smart IR Network Cameras: http://www.vivotek.com/smart-ir/

video:video.video:title: NR8401 Setting Procedure
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8401 is a 16-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1/5/10 is supported with four HDDs, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. Like VIVOTEK NVR ND8301, a local display output port is available with full HD resolution (1920x1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP address, HDD to logical volumes, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8401 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8401 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate the configuration to multiple cameras.

video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK's IP8173H network camera features a 3-Megapixel WDR CMOS sensor to cope with challenging lighting conditions. The WDR feature allows the camera to capture both the dark and bright parts of an image and combine the differences to generate a highly realistic image representative of the original scene, enabling it to provide video quality close to the capabilities of the human eyes. The IP8173H can be widely applied in high contrast environments such as lobby entrances and more. The P-iris lens controls the iris with extreme precision; with its built-in stepper motor, it maintains the iris opening at an optimal level at all times, resulting in superior image clarity and depth of field as well as image quality.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Network Video Recorder NR8201/8301
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK's NR8201/8301 network video recorder offers an elegant recording solution for VIVOTEK network cameras and performs real-time monitoring and recording simultaneously. It supports up to 4-CH(NR8301)/8-CH(NR8301) H.264, MJPEG, and MPEG-4 video and provides multiple recording modes including alarm recording, scheduled recording, manual recording and continuous recording. The installation is very simple as the camera is able to be inserted utomatically when it's plugged in. It also offers a user-friendly interface for the user to configure the network settings and the camera control. Moreover, the 802.3af compliant PoE (Power-over-Ethernet) is able to reduce the complex of the installation, making NR8201/8301 the cost-effective recording systems. The user can utilize the NR8201/8301 to record high-definition mega-pixel videos on removable hard disk(s) with large capacity and a USB interface for data backup. The NR8201/8301 also supports an external hard disk from the eSATA interface. The built-in gateway separates the network camera connection and the data network connection for the prevention of network congestion. Functional four digital inputs and one digital output interfaces are capable of integrating with the security sensors and alarms. The NR8201/8301 are comprehensive network video recorders featuring with multiple functions to provide the best quality and highest performance in network video recording.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/Fh9pbl
➤ Learn more about NR8201: http://goo.gl/hrJ14s
➤ Learn more about NR8301: http://goo.gl/gHlvP4

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Panoramic PTZ
video:video.video:description:
360° Seamless Surveillance Solution Panoramic PTZ
Panoramic PTZ is a groundbreaking new technology developed by the VIVOTEK R&D team for monitoring open areas with extreme detail. This feature is realized through the synergy of a VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera with speed dome camera, and allows users to simultaneously monitor an area overview from a fisheye model while providing the capability for a detailed regional view from a speed dome. The VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera provides 360° surround view without blind spots, while the VIVOTEK speed dome provides fast, precise pan/tilt/zoom movement through its robust design and captures details with precise quality from extreme distances. Suitable applications for Panoramic PTZ include department stores, station lobbies, airports, parking lots, and any wide open areas where comprehensive video surveillance systems and the capability for extreme video detail are essential.

video:video.video:title: A Quick Look at ND8301 Installation
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8301 is an 8-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1 is supported with two removable HDDs for backup efficiency, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. A first desktop type for the VIVOTEK NVR series, a local display output port is now available with full HD resolution (1920X1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP, HDD, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8301 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8301 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate configuration settings to multiple cameras.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/M8IHCl
➤ Learn more about ND8301: http://goo.gl/rYD9R

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FD7141 Professional Fixed Dome Network Camera
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/G8Z1Nj
FD7141 is a professional vandal proof and weather proof outdoor fixed dome. It integrates all the elements needed for outdoor security into a compact package. FD7141 is shielded from dust and water with an IP66 rated housing and can fit in high-risk environments due to its vandal resistant design. And, in order to operate in harsh temperature conditions, we also build heater and fan inside FD7141.
Talking about video quality, FD7141 adopts a wide dynamic range CMOS sensor to take care of challenging lighting conditions. And it also provides true day and night functionality with a removable IR-cut filter and built-in IR illuminators. The vari-focal lens enables you to adjust focal length according to your needs.
Apart from a concrete housing and high video quality, FD7141 also provides several advanced features including dual streams, power over Ethernet, 3GPP, two-way audio by SIP protocol, SD card slot for local storage, and HTTPS encryption to ensure data transmission security.
To sum up, I think its one of the very best models that VIVOTEK has built. In terms of specification, quality and price, VIVOTEK FD7141 is definitely the camera of choice for any outdoor applications.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Smart IR
video:video.video:description:
In most night-time scenarios, very little ambient light is available. Infrared light is a great light source since it is invisible to human eyes but visible to image sensors. A camera with traditional IR illuminators may not be applied in all kinds of environments. This often leads to over- or under-illuminated video footage.
VIVOTEK Smart IR Solves the Problem!
Benefits of VIVOTEK Smart IR - Instantly response to the lighting change - Evenly adjust the IR lighting intensity - Anti-overexposure - Noise Reduction

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Advanced Techniques - Panoramic PTZ
video:video.video:description:
360° Seamless Surveillance Solution Panoramic PTZ
Panoramic PTZ is a groundbreaking new technology developed by the VIVOTEK R&D team for monitoring open areas with extreme detail. This feature is realized through the synergy of a VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera with speed dome camera, and allows users to simultaneously monitor an area overview from a fisheye model while providing the capability for a detailed regional view from a speed dome. The VIVOTEK megapixel fisheye camera provides 360° surround view without blind spots, while the VIVOTEK speed dome provides fast, precise pan/tilt/zoom movement through its robust design and captures details with precise quality from extreme distances. Suitable applications for Panoramic PTZ include department stores, station lobbies, airports, parking lots, and any wide open areas where comprehensive video surveillance systems and the capability for extreme video detail are essential.
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/rhgKU2
➤ Learn more about Panoramic PTZ: http://www.vivotek.com/pptz/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8171V - a Crystal Ball that Secures Your World
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FE8171V is the first fisheye fixed dome network camera from VIVOTEK, featuring detailed 3.1MP-resolution sensor with superb image quality. The FE8171V offers various display layouts, including original surround view, panoramic views, and regional views for various mounting applications. With the latest cutting-edge image processing, hemispherical images captured from the fisheye camera can be converted into conventional rectilinear projection for viewing and analysis. In addition, in the panoramic and regional viewing modes, users can utilize the ultra-smooth ePTZ function to easily zoom in and focus on a region of interest (ROI).
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/uc3Nkq

video:video.video:description:

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK FE8171V - a Crystal Ball that Secures Your World
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK FE8171V is the first fisheye fixed dome network camera from VIVOTEK, featuring detailed 3.1MP-resolution sensor with superb image quality. The FE8171V offers various display layouts, including original surround view, panoramic views, and regional views for various mounting applications. With the latest cutting-edge image processing, hemispherical images captured from the fisheye camera can be converted into conventional rectilinear projection for viewing and analysis. In addition, in the panoramic and regional viewing modes, users can utilize the ultra-smooth ePTZ function to easily zoom in and focus on a region of interest (ROI).
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/uc3Nkq
➤ Learn more about VIVOTEK Fisheye Network Camera FE8171V: http://goo.gl/1dlf3

video:video.video:description:
Equipped with a fisheye lens for 180° panoramic view (wall mount) or 360° surround view (ceiling/floor/table mount) without blind spots, a fisheye camera is able to provide an 8X wider field of view than a standard VGA camera. It is extremely suitable for monitoring open areas such as airports, shopping malls, parking lots, retail stores, offices and more.

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Embedded Plug & Play NVR ND8322P
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ThX64K
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8322p/
ND8322P Supporting HDMI and VGA local video output, users can control the GUI OSD interface via mouse & keyboard, eliminating the need for a separate PC to search video or to playback from the NVR. The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. What's more, ND8322P, featuring various I/O ports, such as eSATA port, alarm input/output, RS232, and RS485 provides users great flexibility of applications.

video:video.video:title: NR8401 Setting Procedure
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8401 is a 16-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1/5/10 is supported with four HDDs, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. Like VIVOTEK NVR ND8301, a local display output port is available with full HD resolution (1920x1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP address, HDD to logical volumes, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8401 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8401 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate the configuration to multiple cameras.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/HGuDRn
➤ Learn more about NR8401: http://goo.gl/quf3RO

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK SD8364E Footage - EIS
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK SD8364E is part of the SUPREME series product line offering 1080p Full HD resolution with superb image quality. Adopting a 30x optical zoom lens, the SD8364E is able to capture details at top-notch quality. The IP66- and NEMA 4X-rated housing protects the camera body against rain, dust and corrosion within a wide temperature range between -40°C to 55°C. This feature ensures operation under extreme weather conditions and hazardous environments. It is especially suitable for monitoring wide open indoor/outdoor spaces such as airports, highways and parking lots where high-level reliability and precision are always required.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/LJiopn
➤ Learn more about SD8364E: http://www.vivotek.com/sd8364e/

video:video.video:title: VIVOTEK Embedded Plug & Play NVR ND8322P
video:video.video:description:
➤ Downloads Video: http://goo.gl/ThX64K
➤ Learn more: http://www.vivotek.com/nd8322p/
ND8322P Supporting HDMI and VGA local video output, users can control the GUI OSD interface via mouse & keyboard, eliminating the need for a separate PC to search video or to playback from the NVR. The new local display design - Auto Adaptive Stream will dynamically modify Stream 2 resolution of a camera to best fit the display resolution according to the layout type, resulting in an efficient display, while maintaining superb image quality. What's more, ND8322P, featuring various I/O ports, such as eSATA port, alarm input/output, RS232, and RS485 provides users great flexibility of applications.

video:video.video:description:
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/FvYs8t
➤ Learn more:http://www.vivotek.com/vivocam-poe-managed-switch
The VIVOTEK AW-GEV series, referred to as VivoCam PoE switch, is the world's first PoE switch with IP surveillance management functions. This switch is not only a standard L2 PoE switch, but also able to set up and configure VIVOTEK IP cameras, NVR and CMS. With single AW-GEV series, the VivoCam PoE switch allows users to find all VIVOTEK devices and deploy a surveillance network system automatically.

video:video.video:title: NR8401 Setting Procedure
video:video.video:description:
VIVOTEK ND8401 is a 16-CH Network Video Recorder designed for sophisticated recording applications. The unit is equipped with an Intel Dual-core Atom Processor with maximum recording throughput at a robust 96 Mbps. RAID 0/1/5/10 is supported with four HDDs, with an external eSATA port for additional expansion. Like VIVOTEK NVR ND8301, a local display output port is available with full HD resolution (1920x1080), eliminating the need for a separate PC to view video from the unit. Setup of parameters such as IP address, HDD to logical volumes, and basic camera configuration can easily be performed with the setup wizard, making the ND8401 the easiest NVR to use yet. When connecting ND8401 to more than one of the same model of VIVOTEK camera, the "Shepherd" program can be used to duplicate the configuration to multiple cameras.
➤ Download Video: http://goo.gl/HGuDRn
➤ Learn more about NR8401: http://goo.gl/quf3RO
